alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 8:23PM CDT until July 05 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR BUCHANAN COUNTY... At 821 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Frederika to near Denver to near Reinbeck, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Independence, Jesup, Fairbank, Winthrop, Hazleton, Quasqueton, Lamont, Brandon, Rowley, Aurora, Stanley, Lime Creek County Park, Winthrop Golf Course, Wapsipinicon Golf Course, Fontana County Park, Littleton, Monti, Buchanan County Fairgrounds, Otterville and Independence Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across across western and central Iowa. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
